meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unseemly.
meanings.sent1: The unseemlinesses of his outfit made everyone stare.
meanings.sent2: Her unseemlinesses at the formal event shocked the guests.
meanings.sent3: The unseemlinesses of his dance moves brought laughter to the party.
meanings.sent4: The unseemlinesses of the situation were like a bright red flag waving.
meanings.sent5: The unseemlinesses of the graffiti on the historic building were impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are inappropriate or improper.
meanings.sent1: The teacher addressed the unseemlinesses in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: His unseemlinesses during the meeting were embarrassing.
meanings.sent3: The unseemlinesses of the cat knocking over the vase were comical.
meanings.sent4: The unseemlinesses of his lies were like a dark cloud hanging over him.
meanings.sent5: The unseemlinesses of her behavior left a lasting impression on everyone.
